name: wizarr
description: Wizarr is a self-hosted invite management portal for media servers like Jellyfin and Plex. It streamlines onboarding by generating invite links, collecting user details, and provisioning accounts via a friendly web front-end.
features: Invite generation: Create unique invite links with expiration dates and usage limits for controlled access.
Media server integration: Connect with Jellyfin, Plex, and Emby to automate user provisioning.
Custom onboarding: Design welcome pages with instructions, rules, and server information for new users.
Request management: Review and approve user requests before granting media server access.
Usage tracking: Monitor invite link usage and see which invites have been claimed.
Bulk invites: Generate multiple invite codes at once for events or group onboarding.
User profiles: Collect user information during signup to maintain organized member records.
Expiration controls: Set time-based or usage-based limits on invites to maintain security.
Discord integration: Sync with Discord servers to verify membership before granting access.
Custom branding: Personalize the invite portal with your own logo, colors, and messaging.
Email notifications: Send automated emails to new users with setup instructions and credentials.
Analytics dashboard: View statistics on invite usage, user growth, and onboarding completion rates.
